page.title: 05POPULATION AT TEVIOTHEAD
page.content: THERE ARE 32 PERSONS LIVING IN THE TEVIOTHEAD DISTRICT:- UNDER 10........10 UNDER 20.........0 UNDER 40........10 UNDER 60.........7 UNDER 80.........3 OVER 80.........2 THERE HAVE BEEN NO{BIRTHS}FOR 6 YEARS AND THE TWO FAMILIES WITH YOUNGER CHILDREN ARE INCOMERS.THERE HAVE BEEN NO{DEATHS}FOR ABOUT 10 YEARS AND THE COUPLE WHO ARE OCTOGENARIANS ARE IN FAIR HEALTH.THE RETIRED PERSONS LIVE QUIETLY,TENDING TO KEEP TO THEMSELVES, BUT 2 OF THE 3 COUPLES DRIVE THEIR OWN CARS.ANNUALLY IN OCTOBER, ALL PERSONS ELIGIBLE TO A VOTE HAVE THEIR NAMES RECORDED FOR THE{ELECTORAL REGISTER}, WHICH ALSO SHOWS A PICTURE OF THE POPULATION MOVEMENT.THE ELECTORAL REGISTER IS KEPT IN THE VILLAGE HALL.
